meanings.definition: Relating to or characterized by syncytium.
meanings.sent1: The syncytial cells in the organism work together as one unit.
meanings.sent2: The doctor explained that the syncytial tissue was formed by the fusion of multiple cells.
meanings.sent3: The syncytial dance troupe moved in perfect harmony, like a single entity on stage.
meanings.sent4: The syncytial nature of the team's collaboration created a seamless workflow.
meanings.sent5: The syncytial structure of the coral reef allowed for efficient nutrient exchange.
